#include <iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		int n;
		scanf("%d",&n);
		int arr[n],count=0;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
		  scanf("%d",&arr[i]);
		  if(arr[i]>=(i+1))
		  {  
		    count+=arr[i]/(i+1);
		    // cout<<"count:"<<count<<endl;
		   }
		  
		} 
		
		if(count%2!=0)
		  printf("ALICE\n");
		else
		  printf("BOB\n");
		
	}
	return 0;
}
